content: s - round s front of work knit three sts from ln knit ★ slk2togtbl - slip 1 st knitwise from ln to rn three sts from cable needle then slip the same stitch purlwise back to ★ c8b - slip four sts to cable needle hold to the ln insert rn from right to left into back back of work knit four sts from ln knit four of 2 sts on ln and knit them together sts from cable needle ★ sm - slip marker from ln to rn ★ c8f - slip four sts to cable needle hold to ★ ssk - slip slip knit slip 2 sts knitwise from ln front of work knit four sts from ln knit four to rn one at a time then knit the 2 slipped sts from cable needle sts together through the back loop ★ k - knit ★ st s - stitch es ★ k2tog - knit two sts together ★ - indicates a repeat ★ ln - left-hand needle ★ - indicates information for different sizes ★ m - marker s watering the trees beanie by amanda stephens © 2025 cold sheep designs | page 3 of 6 pattern instructions brim with smaller needles cast on 75 87 99 111 123 135 sts using german twisted cast-on method join to work in the round being careful not to twist place a stitch marker to indicate bor rnds 1-9 k1 p1 k1 to end round 10 k1 p1 k1 20 24 28 32 36 40 times pm k1 p1 k5 2 times p1 k1 hat body tip the set-up round includes a right lifted increase which adds a stitch and uses a stitch be sure to review the tutorial to ensure that your stitch counts will be correct at the end of this round if you choose to substitute this increase with make-1 increases you will need to replace each rli with m1 k1 in the instructions below i find that the rli gives the neatest transition from the ribbing to the cables change to larger needles set-up round k1 p4 k1 10 12 14 16 18 20 times sm k1 p1 k1 rli rli rli k1 2 times p1 k1 6 sts increased 81 93 105 117 129 141 sts total work cable & textured rib pattern rnds 1-8 following written or charted directions below 2 3 4 5 5 6 times then work rnds 1-4 once more ending after completing a round 4 you will have completed 3 4 5 6 6 7 total cable rounds cable & textured rib pattern written round 1 k1 p1 k2 p1 k1 to m sm k1 p1 k8 p1 k8 p1 k1 round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 repeat round 1 round 4 k1 p4 k1 to m sm k1 p1 c8f p1 c8b p1 k1 round 5 repeat round 1 round 6 repeat round 1 round 7 repeat round 1 round 8 k1 p4 k1 to m sm
